message: The SDG_INDICATOR field for indicator 15-4-2, translated into en
data:
Indicator 15.4.2: (a) Mountain Green Cover Index and (b) Proportion of degraded mountain land[1]

1

Refinement of the indicator name to be reviewed by the Inter-agency and Expert Group on SDG Indicators (IAEG-SDGs) in its 13th meeting in November 2022 for final approval by the 54th session of the Statistical Commission in March 2023. ↑
